    Methods in com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers with parameters of type Part
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    MainController.addOrModifyPart(String title, Part part)
    The addOrModifyPart method creates the stage and scene for the add/modify part window
    (package private) void
    PartController.addOrModifyPart(Part part)
    The addOrModifyPart method initializes the values in each text field if a part was passed in, a null value is passed in if the add part button was pressed.
    (package private) void
    PartController.savePart(Part part)
    The savePart method uses the InventoryValidator class to check all value of the text fields to make sure they are valid, then saves a brand-new part if a null value was passed in or a part is being modified and changed to a different type.
    Method parameters in com.cameronm.inventorymanager.controllers with type arguments of type Part
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) static void
    MainController.partSearchTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> idColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,String> nameColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> inventoryColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Double> priceColumn, javafx.scene.control.Label partNotFoundLabel)
    The partSearchTextField method checks the part search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the parts table with a list of parts that match the beginning of the name or if it matches an id of a part, the part is selected.
    (package private) static void
    MainController.partSearchTextField(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Part> partTable, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> idColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,String> nameColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Integer> inventoryColumn, javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<Part,Double> priceColumn, javafx.scene.control.Label partNotFoundLabel)
    The partSearchTextField method checks the part search text field every time something is typed into the field and refreshes the parts table with a list of parts that match the beginning of the name or if it matches an id of a part, the part is selected.
    (package private) void
    ProductController.saveProduct(Product product, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> associatedPartsCopy)
    The saveProduct method uses the InventoryValidator class to check all value of the text fields to make sure they are valid, then saves a brand-new product if a null value was passed in or a product is being modified

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    InHouse
    The InHouse class extends the Part class and represents a part that was manufactured in-house.
    class 
    Outsourced
    The Outsourced class extends the Part class and represents a part that was outsourced from another company.
